episodes.title: CPS KNEW SHE COULD DIE? 8 YO Diabetic Killed by “Cult” Family
episodes.description:
0:00: Australian true crime 
0:31: Belle Gibson comparison 
2:48: Elizabeth Struhs family 
3:06: The Saints 
4:11: found dead 
4:51: footage from the scene 
6:24: cult like behavior 
7:27: arrest of 14 adults 
7:41: parents previous convictions 
10:40: CPS failure 
12:19: member interviews 
19:11: defendants named 
20:22: cult leader interview 
21:04: Elizabeth's sister 
22:22: unprecedented trial 
32:45: only sleeping 
33:50: verdict 
37:36: sentenced 

You're such a genuine gem. I'm Brooke Makenna or Brooke Mckenna as some of you search (still love ya tho) and I create true crime documentaries from cases all over the world. It is my absolute passion to bring you these victims and survivors stories in hopes that they get more spotlight than the killers ever will. My true crime videos are not meant to cause any harm or disrespect to anyone I talk about. I do my absolute best to collect the factual information from online resources I can find. They are always linked in the description, as they deserve the credit and thanks
 for helping me create this video. Please feel free to correct me in the comments below on any mistakes made. I am never trying to spread inaccurate information. 

Any video clips/photos are used under Fair Use.
